name: Jupiter Jam
description:
Jupiter Jam is a quirky frictionless shooter. The pick-ups refract shots into a bullet hell frenzy. You'll be able to get a sweet upgrade, but only one. Created for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam. 

Controls:

A/D/Left/Right: Turn
W/Up: Thrust
S/Down: Stabilize
Left Click: Annihilation Orb
Right Click: Turbo Boost
Space Bar: Plasma Nova
Shift R: Restart
Tab: Toggle Full Screen
ESC: Exit Fullscreen
F4: Exit Game
K: Hide/show these key bindings

Credits:

Just me! I slacked on audio...  :T
